textBeforeTable: 6 weeks prior to Alpha - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD A list of general tasks which are not particularly related to a Fedora release cycle can be found on Marketing tasks General task list which are not related to a release cycle 7 Final Release - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 6 Preview Release - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 5 Beta Release - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 4 Feature Freeze - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 3 Alpha Release - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 2 6 weeks prior to Alpha - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD 1 General task list which are not related to a release cycle Contents This page contains the schedule template for the marketing project. This schedule depends on Fedora General release schedule. At every release, this schedule should be copied over to Marketing schedule and task list to work with. Revision as of 12:36, 25 February 2009 == General task list which are not related to a release cycle ==
textAfterTable: John Doe 1 YYYY-MM-DD Assign marketing people to SIGs for the rest of the cycle John Doe 1 YYYY-MM-DD Feature Freeze - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD Task Name Owner Priority Target Date Status/Notes Update the features page John Doe 1 YYYY-MM-DD Update the talking points John Doe 1 YYYY-MM-DD Beta Release - From YYYY-MM-DD to YYYY-MM-DD Task Name Owner Priority Target Date Status/Notes Developer interviews on the coming release?
